ref: 9647 bhramaṇa n. ʻ revolution ʼ MBh., ʻ wandering ʼ Kālid. [√bhram]
Pk. bhamaṇa -- n. ʻ turning round in a circle ʼ;
S. bhaüṇu m., ˚ṇī f. ʻ roller between two posts fixed on edge of well for rope to run over ʼ, bhaũṇaṇu ʻ to wander in search of ʼ; E
P. bhaunī f. ʻ wheel over which well -- rope passes, any similar wheel or pulley ʼ;
Si. bamaṇaya sb. ʻ turning, whirling ʼ.
